attributes.action: acknowledge that a large proportion of the workforce in this country is single, and that reference should be made to 'the hard-working population' of this country rather than the constant references to 'hard-working families'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a single person, I find it increasingly upsetting that almost daily there are references made in the House of Commons by members of the Government to 'hard-working families'. I feel that it is about time that those of us who are hard-working singles should be acknowledged for the contribution we make to our country and economy.
